channel.title: Good things to use Power of Greass on?
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Good things to use Power of Greass on?"

item.title: Re: Good things to use Power of Greass on?
item.content:encoded:
I use it on the various monuments when Rune farming. Other good places are:
The Ninjamas Star as mentioned above
The S-Rank Items (Pink Hair Dye, etc.)
Possibly the bloodline exclusive items (grog, etc) if you really want them
If I recall, The Glowing Goo Recipe has a low drop rate
And of course, the Knight Frame Pieces.

Frankly, there aren't that many things worth PoGing for, and most of what is there both loops and has crap resale value so there's no need to get them in later seasons.

item.title: Re: Good things to use Power of Greass on?
item.content:encoded:
Meh I thought EDUT was enough to get a star, but the other reasons above are more or less correct.
You might also want to use it to level up to billy 3, since early on people might struggle with the mission.

item.title: Re: Good things to use Power of Greass on?
item.content:encoded:
Ninja-mas Star
The 3 S-Rank items (Pink Hair Dye, Gothic Album, and Restraining Order)
Note Page if you're really hard off
Any mission you don't want to risk failing

Also remember that you can use a Jutsu alongside Greass. So you can do the jutsu that helps level up allies and Greass so you definitely pass.

item.title: Re: Good things to use Power of Greass on?
item.content:encoded: i haven't got the frame pieces yet, and i don't have haro yet so i guess i really should use it on the star.

item.title: Re: Good things to use Power of Greass on?
item.content:encoded: yes that is a good idea unless you got haro,red rover, spot. And ichi ramen, and stand by your ninja theme. and a dog treat. then you can just use that stuff and save it. um good for hollow jaws if you dont have hollow leg. But what you are supposed to use it on are the knightmare frame piece missions in burgerninja because they are super rare. unless you got them already. It can be used for just bout anything you seem to be having troubles with really.

item.title: Good things to use Power of Greass on?
item.content:encoded:
I wanted to know some good missions to use the power of grease on I am a S2

Use it on the ninja mas star good idea?
